    P

    Project - Class in com.example.simple.jira.model.domain
    Immutable representation of a Jira-like project Project instances carry only identifier and name, while related tasks are managed by TaskRepository
    Project(int, String) - Constructor for class com.example.simple.jira.model.domain.Project
    Creates a new immutable project instance
    ProjectRepository - Class in com.example.simple.jira.model.repository
    In-memory repository responsible for managing projects Repository generates identifiers for projects and guarantees that returned model objects remain immutable This implementation focuses on project lifecycle operations.
    ProjectRepository() - Constructor for class com.example.simple.jira.model.repository.ProjectRepository
    Explicit no-arg constructor.
    ProjectStore - Interface in com.example.simple.jira.model.repository
    Persistence contract for projects

    SimpleJira - Class in com.example.simple.jira
    Application entry point creating dependencies and launching the controller Accepts up to three optional command-line arguments: a project name and an optional initial task title and description.

    T

    Task - Class in com.example.simple.jira.model.domain
    Immutable representation of a single task within a project
    Task(int, String, String, TaskStatus, TaskPriority, int) - Constructor for class com.example.simple.jira.model.domain.Task

    TaskPriority - Enum Class in com.example.simple.jira.model.domain
    Enumeration representing the possible priorities of a task
    TaskRepository - Class in com.example.simple.jira.model.repository
    In-memory repository managing tasks assigned to projects The repository delegates project existence validation to ProjectStore.findById(int) and keeps task data immutable See Task for the task model and ModelOperationException for domain errors thrown by this class
    TaskRepository(ProjectRepository) - Constructor for class com.example.simple.jira.model.repository.TaskRepository
    Creates a task repository backed by the provided project repository
    TaskStatus - Enum Class in com.example.simple.jira.model.domain
    Enumeration representing the possible statuses of a task
    TaskStore - Interface in com.example.simple.jira.model.repository
    Persistence contract for tasks
    TODO - Enum constant in enum class com.example.simple.jira.model.domain.TaskStatus
